    politicxsentwitteR

    The goal of politicxsentwitteR is to …

    Installation

    You can install the released version of politicxsentwitteR from CRAN with:

    install.packages("politicxsentwitteR")

    Example

    This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

    library(politicxsentwitteR)
